messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Truth without Love....
messages.msgSnippet: LOVE WITHOUT TRUTH IS FUTILE TRUTH WITHOUT LOVE IS BRUTAL. ~Nicoletta ***I like this, Nicoletta. Very true. Valerie in Tacoma
messages.messageBody:
LOVE WITHOUT TRUTH IS FUTILE
TRUTH WITHOUT LOVE IS BRUTAL.

~Nicoletta

***I like this, Nicoletta. Very true.

Valerie in Tacoma

messages.subject: Truth without Love....
messages.msgSnippet: Right on Sandra, there is a quote on the wall at my self-healing circle: LOVE WITHOUT TRUTH IS FUTILE (used to be: FOOLISH) TRUTH WITHOUT LOVE IS BRUTAL.
messages.messageBody:
Right on Sandra,

there is a quote on the wall at my self-healing circle:

LOVE WITHOUT TRUTH IS FUTILE (used to be: FOOLISH)
TRUTH WITHOUT LOVE IS BRUTAL.

~Nicoletta
*********************************************************
"It is paradoxical, yet true: Children are the most in
need of loving attention when they act the least
deserving of it!"
by Aletha Solter, 1998
from the article "Why Children Misbehave"
www.awareparenting.com
*********************************************************


It is possible to be kind and truthful. Even my kids do it.

Sandra
